verses.text: (א) Unto thee, O \sc Lord\sc*, do I lift up my soul.
O my God, (ב) I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, Let not mine enemies triumph over me.
(ג) Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: Let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
(ד) Shew me thy ways, O \sc Lord\sc*; Teach me thy paths.
(ה) Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: For thou \add art\add* the God of my salvation; On thee do I wait all the day.
(ז) Remember, O \sc Lord\sc*, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; For they \add have been\add* ever of old.
(ח) Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: According to thy mercy remember thou me For thy goodness’ sake, O \sc Lord\sc*.
(ט) Good and upright \add is\add* the \sc Lord\sc*: Therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
(י) The meek will he guide in judgment: And the meek will he teach his way.
(כ) All the paths of the \sc Lord\sc* \add are\add* mercy and truth Unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
(ל) For thy name’s sake, O \sc Lord\sc*, Pardon mine iniquity; for it \add is\add* great.
(מ) What man \add is\add* he that feareth the \sc Lord\sc*? Him shall he teach in the way \add that\add* he shall choose.
(נ) His soul shall dwell at ease; And his seed shall inherit the earth.
(ס) The secret of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* with them that fear him; And he will shew them his covenant.
(ע) Mine eyes \add are\add* ever towards the \sc Lord\sc*; For he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
(פ) Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; For I \add am\add* desolate and afflicted.
(צ) The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
(ר) Look upon mine affliction and my pain; And forgive all my sins.
(ר) Consider mine enemies; for they are many; And they hate me \add with\add* cruel hatred.
(ש) O keep my soul, and deliver me: Let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
(ת) Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; For I wait on thee.
(פ) Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
